verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: This is my desire, to honor you, Lord with all my heart I worship you

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: All I have within me I give you praise, all that I adore is in you

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: Lord I give you my heart I give you my soul, I live for you alone

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: Every breath that I take every moment I'm awake Lord have your way in me
